abstract: Dallas Police Chief David O Brown, who has national reputation for his success in improving relations between police department and city's minority residents, has become face of nation's shock following shooting deaths of five officers at Dallas protest against police violence; attack, deadliest for law enforcement officers in America since Sept 11 terrorist attacks, has only increased his resolve.
lead_paragraph: As Chief Brown sorted through a jumble of reports, some of them wrong, publicly narrating the standoff between his officers and the gunman, he also offered simple, emotional words.

headline.main: Dallas Police Chief David Brown, a Reformer, Becomes Face of Nation’s Shock
headline.print_headline: City’s Chief, Known as Reformer, Becomes Face of Nation’s Shock

snippet: As Chief Brown sorted through a jumble of reports, some of them wrong, publicly narrating the standoff between his officers and the gunman, he also offered simple, emotional words....

keywords.value: Dallas, Tex, Shooting of Police Officers (2016)
keywords.name: subject
